contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 15, 1895 D Biggar Contest
Biggar Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
biggar
None
Biggar, South Lanarkshire, Scotland, UK Only 2 bands appeared at contest, then adjudicator failed to arrive. Committee gave 1st prize to Galashiels and 2nd to Kirkmuirhill, as Kirkmuirhill had never entered a contest previous to this. Prizes - 1st £25, 2nd £10.
March 29, 2013, 11:54 a.m. June 21, 2019, 9:53 a.m.
1 Galashiels Town Unknown
2 9th L.R.V. (Kirkmuirhill) Unknown
Withdrawn Bo'ness and Carriden Band Unknown
Withdrawn Cleland Unknown
